body: I like it, because it's a logical and conclusive ending, but I want more! I want them to get together in a healthy way damn it!
came to bust one, but it turns out there’s actual decent plot? and it’s sad? the actual fuck
I like the ending, while it was rough he needed to get over it, or else his personality would be 100% dependant on her. Id love for a sequel where they start dating (healthy) tho
@kazmathrowaway321, I know, right? Nobody seems to have even understood the meaning of the ending, why are they all sad or disappointed? lol
Still one of the worst endings fucking trash
that's rough buddy, poor guy
I actually ended up reading this for the plot... Well anyway great story sad times happen.
its still funny too me how little the comments understand the ending, honestly good ending
I don't like bitchy girl :\ (always want to be away when love is involved, just tell the reason why goddammit)

lol, no man like that, if a man didn't get anything from someone in contact, they will cease to contact them n forget they ever exist. there's no way man will keep contact them if cannot get in relationship, money or sex. well i think the author is a girl/woman.
I came here to beat my dick not to get sad wtf is this
In the end, those futas just wanted some fuckbuddies, not lovers
Ehhh such mixed emotions after reading it, so the guys got used by those two and then dumped by them or not maybe a new beginning? Probably the former but I hope it's the latter
that ending really hurt 💔
Besides the ending being bad I guess this artist stopped making the guys fuck the futas anymore. Futadom I no like. 2/10
Sad ending
What an unsatisfying ending.
I dont get it
Fuck that ending I'm limp now

reading this shit is making me lose faith in humanity
this is a sad ending cause the girls didn't receive jail time, the guys just groped and dumped the girls, these girls raped them and blackmailed them
they literally gave them stockholm syndrome, the fuck is wrong with ya'll saying this garbage has a good ending or was good at all?
please someone back me up on this I need to know someone is still sane in this world
6/10 I don’t know why I favourited the entire series I’m prolly never gonna read this again

Sad Engding ;o sometimes, people's feelings are complex to understand themsevles, and misunderstanding cognition makes the incorrect choice of leaving. Two parties, one pair might addicting to sex, and another pair might missing their true intentions to show that they really love each other.
I can't even fap with these feels, why couldn't it just have been a happy ending?
I’m sorry but fuck this ending man cmon
for the people who are saying "she did with him what he did with other girls" please go fuck yourselves. the guys didnt rape any girl you know? they just dump them...

honestly ending is sad, but really really good! like ComeOnBunny said, i think it was for the best! now this ending leaves it open ended for them to perhaps grow a regular relationship together or they can just be friends :)
I fucking hate his endings
its not the worst ending, still understandable and justified but seriously why

God I fucking hate Piririnegi, he writes this completely seriously and somehow doesn't see it as sad. Fucking mental defective.

Who woulda thunk that a pornographer's writing would be indicative of their trashy soul?
then again i guess that's some long run karma isn't it, at least they're still friends i guess
the classic "get over it" ending, one of my least favorite kinds but oh well

After re-reading this I realized one thing, the true punishment wasn't that the boys became the sexual relief of the futanaris, the true punishment was the fact they were cast away after falling in love.

They were supposed to be punished for the same thing they did to the girls, playing with them and casting them aside, not caring about their feelings. In a sense, them still being friends and in contact is a "sweet" enough ending, though I really want to see an afterstory/alternate ending where they get together.

This was a good ending. Considering their relationship started from the boys being blackmailed, raped, and developing stockholm syndrome. It is good that they put distance between themselves it allowed the boys time to process their feelings. The other boy changing and getting over his mother issues will help him grow as a person. After hanging out with Kanae again it is possible he will realize that he does not love her anymore and he was just suffering from stockholm syndrome and can now end things with her properly and have closure or they could start a proper relationship with each other. Either way what happened to the two boys could have potentially ruined their lives and caused all kinds of mental issues and trauma so I am glad that wasn't the case at least.
I don't understand the relation between Kanae's haircut becoming shorter and the hair of Junya's mother. The people commenting on that what does that signify, can u explain pls?
This is the last one? Awwwww :<
Blond guy should just have became an eunuch while he still could, he would still be getting her dick had he remains weak, cute and much shorter than her. What an heartbreaking ending.

I find it funny, this story. But not in a bad way. Because despite the fact that I sympathize with our uke heroes, it is still a fact that they played around with the hearts of their seme's classmates. The seme's essentially did the same: made the uke's love them and then leave them afterwards. The difference is that their is this sort of regret or difficulty in them as they do it. Almost as if they themselves feel attached to the one's they are punishing. I love the artwork, the expressions on the characters faces and most importantly, the complexity of each character and how they grow. 10/10, best romantic drama fap material ever.
The ending was so bad it killed my boner
This is the series that made my account. I am sad that it ended (especially this way.) But it was a nice run
feel so bad, even if the end seem ok. they are not able to get together, but still friend. i do not know why, i feel so bad.
How dare the author play with my heart like that. I just wanted to masturbate, fuck these feels. ( ；∀；)
fapped the first chapter, read the rest cuz of the plot.
im depressed now thx

She took advantage of his insecurities and threw him away in the end. God-tier level shit ending. Hopefully the author does an epilogue because this hentai story had a better story than most trash anime (funny, right?). So disappointing. 1/5 stars. 0/5 if I could go lower.
why you make her reject him T_T im hurt now
Shit tier ending smh
This has been a great ride, but now i gotta end it so that's kinda sad
I normally like sad endings, but this ending sucked ass.
She just did to him the same thing he did to his girlfriend in the first episode, but anyway, look on the bright side: at least he won't be assfucked anymore.
You know I’m surprised how many people hate the ending I’m neutral

i am out numbered here but i like how it ends, honestly i feel he got to hear what he needed to hear and it's not like they aren't still on speaking terms or even friends to a degree. not all stories need to end with couples getting together for them to be a happy ending
Lmao y'all getting triggered over some hentai ending
fucking dog shit ending
Mmmmm I'm such a masochist reading this

damn you
this is not the ending i wanted
Please give us an epilogue chapter, this ending doesn't sit right :/
Wait! Finale?! What! No!! Ugh!!! I really hate how mangas end without a proper resolution
not going to lie, this wasn't a happy ending but it was far nicer than I was predicting
Feels like a depressing ending but the last 3 panels show a bit of hope that the relationships can be fixed. This series was quite an interesting journey

This whole series started with the girls basically raping the boys and just being in contact with them to fuck. At the end after some time they contact the girls again just to hang out and have fun, thats how you build up a real relationship. I 100% believe this is a happy ending for all.

Fantastic ending. At the end of the day the short haired girl assumes that the boy called her to immediately fuck again, and that he has not grown up. Instead he says he just wants to hang out. Basically they never had a boyfriend girlfriend relationship just friends with benefits, but now they are starting all over and building a REAL relationship where they care about eachother and not just pleasure.

I wouldn't say he completely got over his issues. He just stopped trying so hard, but it's not like he actually got his mother's love. Also the girl's hairstyle is shorter in the epilogue, but it's not the same style as the mother's hair if you compare.

Sad ending. Girl just doesn't give that much of a shit and is completely freaked out by the boy's use of subby sex to fill the gaping void in his life. Fuck this plot, seriously
It's been a good ride
Finally translated

Hmmmm. I'm glad I didn't fap to this. I really don't understand where the author went with this, but I guess the boys learned not to play around with others' feelings maybe? Idk. And it also seems that the ending to such a hentai will never be great. Such a shame. It should've stayed simple.
I'm so depressed. What kind of sad ass ending...
yes, finally. a translation TT
